textos_fuente.text: PANTHER NATIONAL - Championship Golf Skip to the content ABOUT Media GOLF AMBASSADORS REAL ESTATE Signature Estates Custom Estates Completed / Under Construction LIFESTYLE MEMBERSHIP BROCHURE CONTACT ABOUT Media GOLF AMBASSADORS REAL ESTATE Signature Estates Custom Estates Completed / Under Construction LIFESTYLE MEMBERSHIP BROCHURE CONTACT ABOUT Media GOLF AMBASSADORS REAL ESTATE Signature Estates Custom Estates Completed / Under Construction LIFESTYLE MEMBERSHIP BROCHURE CONTACT A Lifestyle Few Experience A NEW GENERATION OF GOLF 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE The Panther National championship golf course—designed by the legendary Jack Nicklaus and Justin Thomas making his design debut—features steep elevation changes and dramatic vistas. The 18-hole course can play 8,000 yards from the longest tees all the way down to 4,500 yards. This rare diversity in length allows the picturesque course to be a “major tournament” test for the expert golfer while always presenting a very playable, enjoyable course for all members. “YOU WON’T FIND ANY GOLF COURSE THAT’S EVEN REMOTELY CLOSE TO IT IN ALL SOUTH FLORIDA.” – JACK NICKLAUS, Course Designer “PANTHER NATIONAL IS DESTINED TO BE ONE OF THE TOP PRIVATE COURSES IN FLORIDA.” JUSTIN THOMAS, Course Designer SHORT COURSE – “PANTHER9” This Par-3, nine-hole golf oasis is both incredibly beautiful and challenging. Holes vary in range from 90 to 150 yards and feature the approach shots players will encounter on the championship course. This incredible course includes an island green inspired by the famous 17th hole at TPC Sawgrass. Make up your own match, play closest to the pin, or simply have fun working on your approach and short game. 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF COURSE A LEGENDARY PAIRING JACK NICKLAUS & JUSTIN THOMAS, COURSE DESIGNERS Jack Nicklaus is widely considered the greatest golfer of all time and one of the finest golf course designers in the world. During his professional career from 1962 to 2005, he won 117 professional tournaments, including a record-breaking 18 major championships. Additionally, Nicklaus has designed over 300 golf courses, showcasing his expertise in course design and architecture. Justin Thomas is an American professional golfer who consistently ranks in the top 10 worldwide and competes on the PGA Tour. Since 2015, Thomas has achieved at least one PGA tournament victory each year, including two major golf championships: the PGA Championship in 2017 and again in 2022. Play Video about Jack Nicklaus and Justin Thomas - Panther National Golf Course Designers PANTHER NATIONAL GOLF EXPERIENCE PERFORMANCE TRAINING CENTER Featuring three bays, a golf fitting center, a putting laboratory, and a café, the Center will be a comprehensive facility dedicated to enhancing golfers’ skills. Equipped with the latest technology and staffed by experienced instructors, the Center will provide golfers with opportunities to refine their swings and will be seamlessly integrated into the elite World Class Practice Area. PUTTING COURSE – “THE CUB” Inspired by the Himalayas Putting Course at St. Andrews, Panther National’s nearly one-acre Nicklaus-designed putting course is the perfect place to gather pre- or post-round, settle bets, have fun with family, or train to enhance your putting skills. You will find every putt you can imagine, and some you couldn’t dream of. PRACTICE AREA The Panther National Practice Area is a world-class facility designed to elevate your golf game with a focus on Full Swing and Distance Wedges. Golfers can warm up in style while improving their skills. The range features target greens with trinity zoysia, giving a clear view of shot reactions. This setup mimics different length par threes for enhanced practice. Each target green matches PGA Tour average shot distances, providing a realistic training environment. A 27-yard-wide US Open fairway runs through the center, helping players build on-course confidence. SHORT GAME PRACTICE AREA The Short Game Training Area offers uniquely shaped green and bunkers. This setup helps golfers refine their wedge distances, pitches, and chip shots, essential at Panther National and top courses worldwide. Panther National Clubhouse Panther National Clubhouse Panther National Clubhouse Panther National Clubhouse Panther National Clubhouse MEET THE TEAM DOMINIK SENN Founder & President Dominik Senn is the founder of Panther National as well as Founder & President of 4sports & Entertainment. Born in Zurich, Switzerland, he specializes in investment, management, and consulting—offering an elite level of expertise, influence, access, and insights across the global sports landscape. His vision for Panther National addresses the void in the market for a new, modern, lifestyle-driven golf community that redefines luxury living. “As a former skier, I think very much in landforms. With Panther National, I wanted to create something very special with Jack and Justin. So we have moved almost three million cubic yards of earth to shape a championship course with a links style. We blended dramatic holes with lakes and the look of the neighboring nature preserve. Players can expect the best possible golf experience.” – DOMINIK SENN TOM DYER Director of Golf A highly accomplished golf professional, Tom has garnered accolades including recognition as SECPGA’s “Teacher of the Year,” “Merchandiser of the Year,” and “Golf Professional of the Year,” he has honed his teaching expertise alongside esteemed mentors including Bob Toski, Hank Haney, and David Leadbetter. Tom’s leadership has fostered the success of several Assistant Pros who have gone on to become Head Pros and Directors of Golf. Tom’s expertise helps create an exceptional golf experience for the members of Panther National. DAN FORE Director of Agronomy With nearly four decades in golf agronomy, Dan Fore brings unmatched experience to Panther National. Before joining our team, he played a key role at Greg Norman Design , contributing to the design, construction, and establishment of 22 golf courses across the U.S., Caribbean, Europe, and Mexico. His exceptional resume also includes work at prestigious clubs such as Jupiter Hills Club, Medalist Golf Club and Wade Hampton Golf Club . At Panther National, Dan leverages his extensive knowledge to ensure exceptional quality remains the standard. ADAM SCHAFER Head Golf Professional JAKE LAMORE Director of Outside Operations & Caddie Master PANTHER NATIONAL AMBASSADORS The Panther National Ambassadors program stands as a beacon of excellence, embodying the essence of quality, dedication, and a distinctive lifestyle synonymous with Panther National. learn more Sign up below to access insider information on the offerings at Panther National, or to begin planning your discovery visit to experience Panther National in person. " * " indicates required fields Name * First Last Email * Phone * Comments This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. A new community of uncommon luxury, Panther National’s modern estates provide access to championship golf, World-class amenities, and unparalleled service—all surrounded by the highlights of Palm Beach County. Turn left at the traffic light. The entrance to Panther Valley will be on your right about 1/2 mile. Proceed to the Security Gatehouse. After the gate take the second right into the Country Club Driveway. From Pennsylvania/ West: Follow Interstate 80 East to Exit 19. Turn left at the traffic light. The entrance to Panther Valley will be on your right about 1/2 mile. Proceed to the Security Gatehouse. After the gate take the second right into the Country Club Driveway. From Phillipsburg area: Take Route 57 East, at the last traffic light turn left onto Mountain Ave, stay on Mountain Ave through several traffic lights to the intersection of Rte 46, turn left onto (Route 46 West). At second light turn right onto (Route 517 North), stay on Route 517 approximately 4 miles. At traffic light make a left into Panther Valley and proceed to Security Gate, after passing thru the gate take the second right into the Country Club Driveway. Dominik Senn , Panther National Founder A Lifestyle Few Experience The first-of-its kind ultra-modern golf and lifestyle community, redefining premium living. THE ESTATES The environmental modern architecture of Max Strang, custom built for luxury designed around you. CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF A visionary 18-hole championship course and 9-hole short course designed by Jack Nicklaus and Justin Thomas. WELLNESS & LIFESTYLE A private oasis of athletic club facilities and premier service, set among idyllic nature with quiet walking and biking trails. A CLASS OF OUR OWN 18-HOLE CHAMPIONSHIP COURSE & TRAINING FACILITY DESIGNED
BY JACK NICKLAUS & JUSTIN THOMAS COMING FALL 2023 the art of optimal living THE ESTATES Our private enclave of estates and custom home sites features the world-renowned architecture and interior design of Max Strang. Selecting from elevated palettes and design options, create your own distinct residence of modern elegance and contemporary luxury. HALF-ACRE THIRD-ACRE Willstrong Construction | STRANG DESIGN LUCERNE THIRD-ACRE Willstrong Construction | STRANG DESIGN BASEL HALF-ACRE THIRD-ACRE Willstrong Construction | STRANG DESIGN PONTRESINA HALF-ACRE Willstrong Construction | STRANG DESIGN ZERMATT PALM BEACH COUNTY IS THE ULTIMATE SUNNY PLAYGROUND, A HOTSPOT OF CHIC SHOPPING AND LAIDBACK CULTURE, WHERE LIVING WELL IS TAKEN SERIOUSLY. The Estates Experience Unparalleled Living Be among the first to learn about our select initial offering and how you can join the family of owners at Panther National. AREA HIGHLIGHTS INSPIRATION SURROUNDS YOU Palm Beach County is the ultimate sunny playground, with an array of world-class amenities to explore. EXECUTIVE AIR  TRAVEL Private air travel is minutes away at North Palm Beach. BEACHES & MARINA Fun on the water awaits along 47 miles of coast. WORLD-CLASS  SHOPPING Worth Avenue and Royal Poinciana Plaza allure. TOP PRIVATE  SCHOOLS Nationally-ranked private schools dot the area. POLO &  EQUESTRIAN Prestigious events cultivate a lively social scene. ARTS &  CULTURE A busy calendar spans Broadway to marquee artists. PANTHER NATIONAL WORLD CLASS TEAM ESTATES Max Strang is the Founder and Director of the Miami-based architecture and design firm [STRANG] Design. Panther National—for whom [STRANG] Design has developed the blueprints for both the custom estates and the main buildings of the golf club—is the firm’s largest and most ambitious project to date. CHAMPIONSHIP GOLF 18-hole championship course & training facility designed by Jack Nicklaus & Justin Thomas. Nicklaus heads Nicklaus Design, one of the world's largest golf course design and construction companies—and is the co-designer of the golf experience at Panther National alongside Justin Thomas SALES & MARKETING IMI Worldwide Properties is an innovative and integrated real estate brokerage firm focused on new and emerging luxury real estate opportunities. For over 30 years, its has helped create some of the most recognized luxury real estate communities around the world, guided by CEO and co-founder Mike Collins. DEVELOPMENT WillStrong is a world-class construction and development joint venture that brings together two leading forces in South Florida real estate: construction powerhouse Willoughby and veteran developer CMA Ventures & Land. MEDIA Follow us for the latest news. 13 Mar NEWS Justin Thomas designed a replica of the famous island green at TPC Sawgrass at his golf course in Florida 19 Feb NEWS Panther National named as one of the Top 5 Residential Courses in America 3 Feb NEWS The 12 Best Private Golf Clubs in the U.S., From California to South Carolina A new community of uncommon luxury, Panther National’s modern estates provide access to championship golf, World-class amenities, and unparalleled service—all surrounded by the highlights of Palm Beach County. Panther Run Golf Club - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Naples Golf Communities Panther Run Golf Club Panther Run Golf Club features an 18-hole championship golf course in Ave Maria, Florida. In addition to the course, they have a driving range and clubhouse. The Club was formerly known as The Golf Club at Del Webb and is located 30 miles east of Naples. Additionally, the course features 6 sets of tee allowing a pleasurable golf experience for all levels of golfers. Wide-open fairways with large greens, the club was named as a 2010 Top 50 course for women by Golf Digest. Also, residents will enjoy a resort-style pool, lap pool, tennis courts, bocce ball courts, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. Furthermore, this is a 55+ golf community that offers an active lifestyle. Single-family homes and attached villas are spread throughout the community. Membership in the club is optional. The Naples Golf Guy Team specializes in helping buyers and sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida Golf Communities. Contact us today for more information.
